00026 /* Best if viewed with 4-space tabs */
00027 
00028 #ifndef __LOW_PASS_FILTER_CPP
00029 #define __LOW_PASS_FILTER_CPP
00030 
00031 //----------------------------------------------------------------------------//
00032 
00033 #include "SoundSample.h"
00034 #include "Collection.h"
00035 #include "Track.h"
00036 #include "MultiTrack.h"
00037 #include "Filter.h"
00038 #include "LowPassFilter.h"
00039 
00040 //----------------------------------------------------------------------------//
00041 LowPassFilter::LowPassFilter(float gain)
00042 {
00043         // set parameters
00044         g = gain;
00045 
00046         // initialize y_hist queue
00047         y_hist = new Filter::hist_queue<m_sample_type>(1);
00048         y_hist->enqueue(0.0);
00049 }
00050 
00051 //----------------------------------------------------------------------------//
00052 LowPassFilter::~LowPassFilter()
00053 {
00054         delete y_hist;
00055 }
00056 
00057 //----------------------------------------------------------------------------//
00058 m_sample_type LowPassFilter::do_filter(m_sample_type x_t)
00059 {
00060         m_sample_type y_t;
00061 
00062         // y(t) = x(t) + g*y(t-1)
00063         y_t = x_t + (g * y_hist->dequeue());
00064         y_hist->enqueue(y_t);
00065 
00066         return y_t;
00067 }
00068 
00069 //----------------------------------------------------------------------------//
00070 void LowPassFilter::reset()
00071 {
00072         // reinitialize y_hist queue
00073         delete y_hist;
00074         y_hist = new Filter::hist_queue<m_sample_type>(1);
00075         y_hist->enqueue(0.0);
00076 }
00077 
00078 //----------------------------------------------------------------------------//
00079 void LowPassFilter::xml_print()
00080 {
00081 
00082         cout << "\t\t<LowPassFilter>" << endl;
00083         cout << "\t\t\t<g value=\"" << g << "\" />" << endl;
00084         cout << "\t\t</LowPassFilter>" << endl;
00085 
00086 }

00089 #endif //__LOW_PASS_FILTER_CPP
